response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $14,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. We are confident that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear your positive response soon. Thank you for considering our proposal.", "product_price": 14000}
